ModMetaData.name: Fixable Mood Debuffs Alert - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: fyarn
ModMetaData.description: This mod alerts you whenever your colonists who are in a relationship are sleeping in different beds. (This is the dev version of No Long Distance Relationships. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
